title: Port SML diff generation (sml/diff.rs) - ~302 lines
description: Generate diff results: compareRows, compareCells, detect row insertions/deletions, cell-level changes. Build SmlChange records.

description: Define SmlChangeType enum, CellSignature, CellFormatSignature, WorksheetSignature, WorkbookSignature, SmlComparerSettings, SmlComparisonResult, HighlightColors. Implement serde serialization.

title: Port pml/shape_match.rs (~283 lines)
description: Port shape matching algorithm. Matches shapes within slides for detailed diff.

title: Port WML comparer - Part 3: Run-level comparison (~500 lines)
description: Character-level comparison within matched paragraphs. Split runs on boundaries, correlate tokens. Functions: compareRuns, splitRuns, correlateTokens.

title: IPC commands for document comparison
description: Implement Tauri commands: compare_word, compare_excel, compare_powerpoint. Handle file paths, return comparison results.

title: Port SML comparer (sml/comparer.rs) - ~578 lines
description: Main Excel comparison entry point: compare(), produceMarkedWorkbook(), buildChangeList(). Orchestrate canonicalize -> sheets match -> diff -> markup pipeline.

title: Port WML comparer - Part 1: Setup and paragraph extraction (~600 lines)
description: Main comparer entry point, document opening, paragraph extraction, ComparisonUnitGroup building. Functions: compareDocuments, extractParagraphs, buildComparisonUnits.

title: Verify Phase 3: All SML golden tests pass with 100% coverage
description: Run all Excel comparison tests, verify output matches TypeScript version. 100% line coverage for sml/ module.

title: Port WML document parsing (wml/document.rs) - ~513 lines
description: Implement document structure extraction: paragraphs, runs, tables, headers, footers, footnotes, endnotes. Define ComparisonUnit struct for LCS matching.

title: Port WML types (wml/types.rs) - ~177 lines
description: Define WmlChangeType enum, WmlChange struct, WmlComparerSettings, WmlComparisonResult, WmlChangeListItem, WmlChangeListOptions. Implement serde serialization.

title: Port LCS algorithm (lcs.rs) - ~340 lines
description: Port findLongestMatch, computeCorrelation, flattenCorrelation, diffText. Define CorrelationStatus enum, Hashable trait, CorrelatedSequence struct, LcsSettings. Include property-based tests with proptest.

title: API documentation with rustdoc
description: Document all public APIs with rustdoc. Include examples, panic conditions, and error types.

title: Phase 6 Verification: Tauri app integration test
description: Create minimal Tauri app that uses the plugin. Verify document comparison works end-to-end via IPC.

title: Phase 7: Polish, Documentation & Release
description: Performance benchmarks vs TypeScript, API documentation (rustdoc), usage examples, README/CHANGELOG, publish to crates.io. Duration: 2-3 days.

title: Port WML revision handling (wml/revision.rs) - ~402 lines
description: Handle tracked changes: insertions, deletions, moves, formatting changes. Functions: createDeletionElement, createInsertionElement, processRevisions, consolidateRevisions.

title: Port redline-js to Rust (redline-rs)
description: Complete port of the TypeScript document comparison library (~10,800 lines) to Rust for native Tauri integration and WASM bundle support. Requirements: 100% test coverage, 100% faithful port of C#/TypeScript logic. Estimated 22-30 working days. Deliverables: redline-core (pure Rust lib), redline-wasm (browser/Node bindings), redline-tauri (desktop plugin).

title: Port hash utilities (hash.rs) - ~43 lines
description: Implement hashString using sha2 crate. Return hex-encoded SHA256 hash. Simple but critical for LCS matching.

title: Document TypeScript implementation specifics for faithful Rust port
description:
CRITICAL: The TypeScript port has many heuristics and bug fixes NOT in the original C#. These MUST be documented and replicated in Rust:

**Image/Relationship Fixes (02591e9):**
- extractStructuralElements() preserves drawings/pictures as structural elements
- stripSectPrFromProperties() removes sectPr from deleted paragraphs to prevent orphan rId references
- wrapParagraphRunsWithRevision() preserves structural elements in whole-paragraph revisions

**ID Handling (9515525):**
- Ignore docPr/@id when comparing drawings (varies between docs for identical content)
- This affects SmartArt, images, and other drawings

**Heuristic Algorithm Differences:**
- Word-level granularity (TS) vs Character-level atoms (C#)
- Similarity thresholds: 0.4/0.5 (TS) vs DetailThreshold=0.15 (C#)
- Flat paragraph units vs Hierarchical grouping
- calculateSimilarity(): Word-level Jaccard similarity
- findSplittingReferences(): Detect footnote/endnote refs splitting words
- classifySequence(): Categorize changes as meaningful/punctuation/reference
- Structural token grouping: Group changes separated only by DRAWING_/PICT_/MATH_/TXBX_

**Other Critical Behaviors:**
- Accept tracked changes before comparing (883ca44)
- Table row comparison as atomic units
- Paragraph similarity threshold for complete replacement (6f53927)
- Footnote/endnote comparison support (21014e6)
- Adjacent delete-insert handling (73bb3f9)
- Format change detection for bold, italic, underline, etc.

title: README and usage examples
description: Write comprehensive README. Include quick start, API examples for Rust/WASM/Tauri, and comparison with TypeScript version.

title: Port SML row handling (sml/rows.rs) - ~41 lines
description: Handle row-level operations: inserted rows, deleted rows. Row alignment using LCS.

title: Port WML comparer - Part 2: LCS-based paragraph alignment (~500 lines)
description: Apply LCS algorithm to correlate paragraphs between documents. Handle equal, deleted, inserted sequences. Functions: correlateParagraphs, alignParagraphs.

title: Port SML canonicalize (sml/canonicalize.rs) - ~944 lines
description: Normalize workbook for comparison: extract sheet signatures, cell values, formulas, formats, comments, hyperlinks, data validations. Handle shared strings table, style normalization.

title: Port core type definitions (types.rs) - ~210 lines
description: Define Document struct, RevisionType enum, Revision struct, WmlComparerSettings, WmlComparisonResult, SmlChangeType enum, SmlComparerSettings, SmlChange, SmlComparisonResult. Use serde for serialization.

title: Phase 0: Project Setup & Infrastructure
description: Initialize Cargo workspace, set up CI/CD for native and WASM builds, configure test infrastructure, copy golden test files from TypeScript. Duration: 1 day.

title: Port OOXML package handling (package.rs) - ~255 lines
description: Implement OoxmlPackage struct, openPackage using zip crate (sync), parseContentTypes, determineFileType. Functions: getPartAsString, getPartAsXml, setPartFromString, setPartFromXml, savePackage, clonePackage, listParts, hasPart, getRelationships. Define Relationship struct and REL_TYPES constants.

title: Release artifacts and CI publishing
description: Setup GitHub Actions for: crates.io publish, npm publish, GitHub releases with binaries for major platforms.

title: Port pml/markup.rs (~597 lines)
description: Port PowerPoint markup generation. Produces visual diff annotations in slides.

title: Port XML parsing/building utilities (xml.rs) - ~248 lines
description: Implement XmlNode enum, parseXml using quick-xml Reader, buildXml using quick-xml Writer. Helper functions: getTagName, getChildren, getAttributes, getAttribute, setAttribute, getTextContent, findNodes, findByTagName, cloneNode, createNode, addXmlDeclaration.

title: JavaScript API wrapper
description: Create ergonomic JS/TS API over WASM exports. Type definitions, async wrappers for file operations, error handling.

description: All golden tests pass. Docs complete. Benchmarks documented. Packages published. README accurate.
